publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4363.4 George Lyon: Council Tax and Pensioner Povertyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4363) in the name of Mr John Swinney, leave out from first "council tax" to end and insert "Scottish Executive has established the independent inquiry into local government finance consistent with the Partnership Agreement of May 2003; notes that the Labour Party has submitted clear and detailed proposals to support changes to the council tax, and further notes that the Liberal Democrats have submitted clear and detailed proposals to support a local income tax and that the inquiry is due to report in the future." Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*
